Introduction

Dear Customer,Congratulations on purchasing this equipment. Please read this manual carefully and take care of the following hints to avoid damages. Any failure caused by ignoring the items and cautions mentioned in the instructionmanual are not covered by our warranty and anyliability.

Technical Specifications

Function:Dry Iron

  • Model :T-503A.
  • Rated parameter:AC220-240v 50Hz 1200W.
  • Type of Fabric- Nylon,Silk,Wool,Cotton,Linen.
Conditions of First Use
x = true; if (x) then console.log("It is true"); x = true; if (x) then console.log("It is true"); x = true; if (x) then console.log("It is true"); x = true; if (x) then console.log("It is true"); x = true; if (x) then console.log("It is true");

Before using for the first time, please check if the voltage rating on the type plate corresponds to the mains voltage in your home, if not, please contact with the seller.

The Iron has been greased, and as a result the Iron may slightly smoke when switched on for the first time.This should cease after a short while.

Before using for the first time ,remove any sticker or protective foil from the soleplate.Clean the Soleplate with a soft cotton cloth.

Keep The soleplate smooth ,avoid hard contact with metal objects(such as clothes rack,buttons and slide fasteners)

Component Names
To get started with Using your World Love Dry Iron Let Us Identify the components.
  1. Spray nozzle.
  2. Covered Water filling inlet.
  3. Variable Steam Control.
  4. Self Clean System.
  5. Spray Button.
  6. Burst of Steam button.
  7. Auto Off Indicator.
  8. Pilot light.
  9. Temperature Control dial.
  10. Flexible Cord Protector.
  11. Power Cord.
  12. Transparent Water Tank.
  13. Stainless Steel Soleplate.
  14. Water Level Indicator.

Dry Ironing

Before using this Iron ,please classify the clothes as per its washing label, as it will be quicker to heat up than to cool clothes(such as synthetic fabric, silk etc).with lower Ironing temperature shall be Ironed firstly and then the other clothes such as Wool, Cotton,Linen with higher temperatures.

Stand the Iron on it's end and turn the thermostat to the MIN position.

Plug in the Iron and select the temperature by turning the thermostat dial, wait until the indicator light goes off indicating that the required temperature is reached.

After Ironing

Unplug from Mains and allow Dry Iron to Cool.

Cleaning and Maintainance

Before Cleaning, remove the plug from the socket and allow the iron to cool down sufficiently.

  1. Wipe off the soleplate with damp cloth and a non abrasive liquid cleaner.
  2. If Fibre is adhered to the soleplate ,use a damp cloth with vinegar to wipe off the soleplate .
  3. Never use strong acid or alkali in order to avoid damaging soleplate.
  4. Stand the Iron on its end and let it cool down sufficiently.
